Borghal

I’m trying to revive old hardware using ChromeOS Flex. I’m publishing this note with an old Asus Eee PC that I bought back in 2007 or 2008 (or even later?). This little laptop served me just fine for several years. It was originally running some flavor of linux. I guess it still does today.
I think this will be my main computer for a few months early next year, if things go as planned… More on that, later.
content:

I think this will be my main computer for a few months early next year, if things go as planned… More on that, later.
